RTS Camera Command System from original creator
Allows your formation attack one of the enemy formation by middle clicking on enemy units. Allows you to select your formation using mouse.
For latest RTS Camera: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2879991660 For compatible Battle Mini Map: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2876503777
Save compatibility: This mod won't read/write anything from/into your save, so you can feel free to enable or uninstall this mod at any time.
Usage: Click middle mouse button on the enemy formation to make your formation attack it. Only effective with melee weapons. Click middle mouse button on your formation to select it. The attacked enemy formation will be highlighted with red outline when you open command panel. Your attacked formation will be highlighted with dark blue outline when you open command panel. Your selected formation will be highlighted with green outline when you open command panel.
Press L to open config menu during battles.
Hotkeys: Click mouse middle button - Select/Attack formation. Alt + Click mouse middle button - Attack enemy formation without interrupting previous movement orders L - Open the config menu. All the hotkeys can be changed in config menu.
Troubleshooting If there're a lot of "text with id xxxxx doesn't exist": If you enabled Realm of Thrones, please move RTS Camera and Command System above it. As version 6.2 of Realm of Thrones, there's a bug in its file that causes all the mods below it cannot load text correctly.
